timeline.message: feat(FieldMappingField): Added a new component for mapping between two select fields. Added this feature to the dynamic fieldMapping util.
feat(JiraCloudDistributionUIConfig): Added the new FieldMappingField to the java files to show working field generation in UI.
feat(FieldMappingEndpointField): The field will now be displayed dynamically when set in the java descriptor
feat(FieldMappingField.js): Converted the select fields in the modal to be text fields so that users have greater flexibility. Also fixed some smaller issues.
deleted a number of classes that were used to set up custom options from the backend, use text fields now and no longer need options.

timeline.bodyText: We'll need to eventually add this to Jira Server as well.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Working on the custom field mapping, adding the predefined replacement values
Refactor: working on saving and editing the Jira custom field mappings
Refactor: Fixing the field mapping deletion

timeline.bodyText: Oh wow. This is probably a bug in a few other places as well. I'll create a ticket against 6.4.0
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Fix: prevent new row being added when editing a row.

timeline.bodyText: We should put this in its own field group. "Advanced" or something. I think you can apply it to ConfigField.
